shrimp.name: VLfBm2D
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: x
input.description: x coordinate to sample VLfBm at

input.name: y
input.description: y coordinate to sample VLfBm at

input.name: lacunarity
input.description: Controls the smoothness of the VLfBm

input.name: gain
input.description: Controls the contrast of the VLfBm

shrimp.usage: VLfBm is a sumation of noises at different frequencies, using VLNoise instead of signed noise. Note that the output is not clamped and may exceed +1 or -1.
